MS_MALDI.Name: 4800 Plus MALDI-TOF/TOF Analyzer, AB
MS_MALDI.Dissociation_Summary: Collission Induced Disociation (CID) Selection of ion precursor (Timed Ion Selector) Reduction of energy of ions before collision cell (Deceleration Stack 6.30 Kv). In the collision cell the ion precursors are fragmented for collision with atmosferic gas and then are reaccelerated in source 2 with variable voltage and ground to get fine-tune spectrum. Collision Cell 7.00 Kv Collision Cell Offset -0.04 Kv Source 2 Delay 27304(ns) Metastable suppressor suppress the precursor ions and deflect the metastable fragment ions formed after second source. Metastable Suppress 1 Kv, Delay 38340.158 (ns) The fragment ions formed in Collision cell and a fraction of precursor ions reach the reflector detector
MS_MALDI.Oparameters: Pulse rate up to 200 Hz with < 500 psec duration/pulse

userParam.name: 4000 Series Explorer 3.5.2 (Spectra Acquisition and Processing Software ; GPS Explorer 3.6 (Automatic Protein Database Searches); Data Explorer 4.9.6 (Spectra Reprocessing Software)
